roi_feature_map:
{
  "resolving_features": [
    "Digital Adoption Platform",
    "Analytics",
    "GenAI-powered in-app guidance",
    "Simulated training",
    "Application analytics",
    "Contextual user experiences",
    "Step-by-step guidance",
    "Self-help user support",
    "Content segmentation and personalization"
  ],
  "details": "These features provide a return on investment for ICICI Bank by improving employee onboarding and training experiences, reducing energy consumption and improving overall sustainability. The Digital Adoption Platform and GenAI-powered in-app guidance enable employees to efficiently use energy management systems, reducing waste and improving sustainability. Analytics and Application analytics provide real-time insights to track user behavior and adoption, enabling data-driven decisions to improve user experiences. Simulated training, Step-by-step guidance, and Self-help user support features improve employee proficiency and adoption of new software and systems, reducing the need for manual processes and guides. Content segmentation and personalization enable personalized and contextual support to users based on their needs and behavior, improving overall user experiences and driving community impact. By implementing these features, ICICI Bank can improve its digital transformation and adoption, energy management, and sustainability, resulting in a significant return on investment."
}
